word: I wrote several pages in regard to the responsibilities resting upon every individual member of the church to have some part to act in the Master's vineyard. I attended the half-past-five-o'clock meeting and rejoiced to see a good number present, for I had important words from the Lord to speak to them.--Ms. 42, 1890, pp. 8-9 (Diary 6, pp. 232-233).
